markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expanded Senses](/Feats.aspx?ID=2889) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 67 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon evolves more acute senses. Your eidolon gains [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416) and [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415), as well as [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417) as an [imprecise sense](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) with a range of 30 feet.
name: Expanded Senses
